scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures gathered together, all with golden halos, suggesting they are important religious figures. In the center, a woman in a blue robe with her hands clasped in prayer is prominent. Above them, a dove descends from a radiant light, with rays of light extending downwards. The figures are enclosed within an arched frame, decorated with foliate motifs. The background is a bright blue sky. This scene represents the descent of the Holy Spirit upon the Virgin Mary and the Apostles.
